pages.text: The scent of blood is like cannabis to zombies. Never allow the smell of blood to cling to you, or you'll attract a horde of die-hard fans. And certainly, don't bring that bloody aroma into your sanctuary. You wouldn't want to wake up only to find a bunch of over-enthusiastic junkies who can't wait to devour you.
Hence, having some gauze and bandages for stopping bleeding and dressing wounds is a crucial preparation.
